title: Payroll tax breaks will get another year in Brazil
description:
The Brazilian government’s whip in Congress, Senator Randolfe Rodrigues, said the Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva administration reached an agreement to grant 17 economic sectors another year of a special benefit that reduces payroll taxes. Mr. Rodrigues made his remarks after meeting with After a Monday meeting with Finance Minister Fernando Haddad and the government’s Senate […]

The post Payroll tax breaks will get another year in Brazil appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Feds subpoena Bolsonaro amid coup plot probe
description:
Brazilian Federal Police subpoenaed former President Jair Bolsonaro to come in for a deposition as part of investigations into an attempted coup to keep him in office regardless of the results of the 2022 presidential elections. Attorney Fabio Wajngarten, a spokesman for Mr. Bolsonaro and his former press secretary, said on social media that his […]

The post Feds subpoena Bolsonaro amid coup plot probe appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Brazil’s economic activity accelerated in December
description:
The Central Bank’s monthly economic activity indicator (IBC-Br) expanded 0.82 percent month-on-month in December, slightly above market consensus. Figures for October and November were also revised upwards, bringing the quarterly result to December to 0.22 percent higher than the previous three-month period. The index, considered a reliable bellwether for the economy, points to a rebound […]

The post Brazil’s economic activity accelerated in December appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
